text:
Finn Wolfhard (born December 23, 2002) is a Canadian actor and musician. He is best known for starring as Mike Wheeler in the Netflix series "Stranger Things". He also appeared in the 2017 movie "It" as Richie Tozier and the television series "Supernatural". He was also the lead singer and guitarist of the rock band Calpurnia until 2019. The Stranger things Star is also currently dating Jessica Nolan.
Wolfhard was born in Vancouver, British Columbia. He has a German, French and Jewish background.
